alert.note: Alert for Estill; Fleming; Montgomery (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 03 at 9:56PM EST until February 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Bath, Estill, Fleming, Menifee, Montgomery, Powell and Rowan. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 951 PM EST, Doppler radar continued to light to occasionally moderate rainfall across the area. This will continue to keep small streams and creeks running high. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mount Sterling, Stanton, Irvine, Flemingsburg, Owingsville, Frenchburg, Marshall, Jeffersonville, Camargo, Clay City, Ravenna, Sharpsburg, Salt Lick, Fairview, Peeled Oak, Kendall Springs, Stepstone, Crooks, Preston and Howards Mill. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
